full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 135 of 197 2676 LCHVMAX4 Healy - direct 1 remember. 2 Q. Did you ever meet Ghislaine Maxwell? 3 A. I did. 4 Q. And who was she? 5 A. She was my boss as well. 6 Q. Do you see her in the courtroom? 7 A. I do. 8 Q. And where is she and what is she wearing? 9 A. She is right there, and she's wearing a black mask. 10 MS. MENNINGER: If the record could reflect identification of Ghislaine Maxwell. 11 12 THE COURT: It may so reflect. 13 MS. MENNINGER: Thank you. 14 Q. What kinds of things did you see Ghislaine doing in the office? 15 16 A. She oversaw properties and decorating and, you know, that kind of stuff. 17 18 Q. Were you reporting directly to her? 19 A. I reported to her and I reported to Jeffrey as well. 20 Q. And when you talked about running all over New York, what kinds of things were you doing in your roles running around New York? 21 22 23 A. To be quite honest, it's a long time ago. If documents needed to be dropped off or picked up or just really -- I really can't answer it because it's so long ago, to be quite 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016864
